attributes.action: Cut MP’s wages to the UK average, put the rest of the money to where it’s needed
attributes.additional_details: It would make you MP’s realise that the rate of inflation isn’t reflected in salaries or wages and the cost of living is becoming extortionate. With the money saved by all MPs taking a pay cut to UK average earnings would make them think for the people of this great land and not themselves.
attributes.background: We need MPs to take a pay cut instead of these big pay rises that you keep giving yourselves and put the money to where it’s really needed to the real people that run the country i.e. nurses doctors hospitals police etc

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
